TopicTitle: Urban Exploration Photos of Soviet Space Shuttle Program

Articles.Content:
[http://petapixel.com/2015/06/14/photographer-captures-the-ruins-of-the-soviet-space-shuttle-program/](http://petapixel.com/2015/06/14/photographer-captures-the-ruins-of-the-soviet-space-shuttle-program/)

The above link shows pictures of what happens when governments fall. It's sad that there is a reasonably operational shuttle sitting there that won't see space.
